function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate disaster management protocols for architectural and urban institutions for biological disasters like disease epidemics","Impact":"Severely impacts the liveability of cities, leading to social and economic disruptions","Mitigation":"Implement bio-risk management protocols and incorporate pandemic preparedness measures into planning and design strategies","Technologies":"Smart Cities data and wearable technologies","People":"Citizens, urban professionals, local authorities","Owner":"Urban authorities, architectural and urban professionals"},{"Description":"Lack of preparedness and response to pandemics despite the availability of modern technologies","Impact":"Cities being caught unprepared for disease outbreaks, leading to significant consequences on livelihood and infrastructure","Mitigation":"Utilize modern technologies to scaffold quality prior preparedness, including the use of wearable technologies and data from Smart Cities","Technologies":"Modern technologies, wearable technologies, data from Smart Cities","People":"Urban professionals, local authorities","Owner":"Architectural and urban institutions"},{"Description":"Limited consideration of bio-risk management in architectural and urban planning","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to biological disasters and disease epidemics, posing a direct threat to the liveability of cities","Mitigation":"Incorporate bio-risk management into architectural and urban planning, following the recommendations from the International Federation of Biosafety Association (IFBA)","Technologies":"Smart Cities data, wearable technologies, bio-risk management protocols","People":"Citizens, urban professionals, local authorities, architectural and urban professionals","Owner":"Urban authorities, architectural and urban professionals"}]}
